block.para: Gets EXIF information from a a JPG, JPEG, or PNG file, uploads the image file to an &S3long; (&S3;) bucket, uses &REKlong; (&REK;) to identify the three top attributes (labels in &REK;) in the file, and adds the EXIF and label information to a &DDBlong; (&DDB;) table in the Region.
For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
